Title: The Great Attractor
Description: Increase the force of attraction of the Bubble.

Title: Repulsion
Description: Enemies get slowed when close of the Bubble.

Title: Swipe Attack
Description: Melee attack now attacks enemies in front of it.

Title: Kamikaze
Description: When the Bubble is attacked it has a chance to deal small damage to the attacker

Title: Ray Attack
Description: Pistol Attacks have a chance to pierce.

Title: Holy Geometry
Description: Bubble has a chance to ignore damage
